These Terms and Conditions and any amendments or variations thereto take effect on their date of publication.

iLoan is a digital loaning mobile application that users can use to apply for a loan instantly. A user needs to provide vital and necessary details into the application and the loan will be automatically processed, and if qualified the user will be issued out the loan. Some of the required details includes BVN, account number, and other details. The user is obligated to pay back the loan at an allocated time usually after a month with interest. "
